message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $170.  I think it's a great deal for the value it provides.
I'm really interested in the product, but $170 is a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest.  While I can't go as low as $120, I'm willing to come down a bit to $150.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $150 is still a bit too high for me. I'm thinking more along the lines of $130.
